location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Lieutenant-Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Stannus reports that he had received letters from the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd] indicating that he intended to commence hostilities with the Bushire Government immediately. Stannus had informed the Bombay Government that he intended to preserve strict neutrality in the dispute until directed otherwise.
